title: RHOBH: The Hills Have Lies
description:
The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills month of reunions concludes with an hour of grilling Erika. There are tears, curses, and most of all - inconsistencies. In the end we only know what thing for certain: Kyle Richards loves a reaction shot.

Be sure to watch our recap with Crappens on Demand here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/58280323
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
